category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAutomateAndLinkErrorInsteadOfWarning
preference.preference_description: Currently, automateAndLink does not return any error ( gives a warning) when there is an issue. This by design behavior causing issue in bulk object creation context. When preference value is set to true, automateAndLink extension returns error if there is an error from this extension, othewise no error is returned( existing behavior). In bulk object creation context, when error is returned (preference value set to true) from this extension, object creation will be rolled back. Let's take an example of 10 objects bulk creation process. If 1 object creation fails due to automateAndLink when this preference is set to true and rest has no issue, 9 objects will be created. When this prefrence is set to "false", 10 objects will be created.
